question.title: After Apache ignite upgrade to 2.16 keys remain to rebalanced are not zero
question.body:
We are using apache ignite in java spring boot application. Our ignite cluster is of 5 node with multiple caches of the type PARTITIONED cache and key value cache.

After upgrade to ignite 2.16 we observe the KeysToRebalanceLeft are non zero always.

So any suggestion on this.

IgniteCache<Object, Object> cache = igniteInstance.cache(cacheName);
        long keysToRebalanceLeft = cache.localMetrics().getKeysToRebalanceLeft();
        long partitionsTotal = cache.localMetrics().getTotalPartitionsCount();
        long rebalancingPartitionsCount = cache.localMetrics().getRebalancingPartitionsCount();
        long rebalancedKeys = cache.localMetrics().getRebalancedKeys();
        long estimatedRebalancingKeys = cache.localMetrics().getEstimatedRebalancingKeys();
